text: Osilo (Ósile, Ósili, Ósilu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 3,059 people lived there. Its area is 98.03 km². It is 672 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Osilo
